title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.124 - Fair market value
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.124 - Fair market value

State Regulations
(a) Value
determined by bona fide bargaining between well-informed buyers and sellers, usually over a period of time. (b) An estimate of market value, in the absence of sales or quotations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.124

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
